# `sys` for [system](/commands/categories/system.md)

<div class='command-title'>View information about the system.</div>

## Signature

```> sys {flags} ```


## Input/output types:

| input   | output |
| ------- | ------ |
| nothing | record |

## Examples

Show info about the system
```nu
> sys

```

Show the os system name with get
```nu
> (sys).host | get name

```

Show the os system name
```nu
> (sys).host.name

```
